Package com.datastax.astra.internal

Class RetryHttpClient

java.lang.Object
com.datastax.astra.internal.RetryHttpClient
All Implemented Interfaces:
ApiConstants
public class RetryHttpClient extends Object implements ApiConstants
Http Client using JDK11 client with a retry mechanism.
